IO package

Read and Writer Interfaces

class rktoolkit.io.io.RKModelReader

Bases: object

RK Model Reader Interface Must implement the following interfaces. The classmethod hook will read the RK-model based.

close()

Close the reader

next() → RKModel

Reads next line if exists.

read() → RKModel

Reads from the RK-Model.

readAll() → List[RKModel]

Reads the RK-Models and returns a list of them.

class rktoolkit.io.io.RKModelWriter

Bases: object

Datastore Interface

Writes a RK-model. The classmethod hook is used to write the RK-Model using the given parameter.

write(model: RKModel) → bool

Writes the RK-model. Returns whether success or failure on write. :param model: RK-Model to be written :type model: RKModel
